ticket.title: Durable consume index and pre-effect durability barrier

tickets.reason: AJC identity and consume semantics must be stable before durable uniqueness implementation.

in_scope: Implement write-once durable consume record keyed by ajc_id for authoritative mode.
Enforce pre-effect durability barrier for consume acceptance.
Deny duplicate consume attempts across restart/crash/replay conditions.
Expose coverage metrics for durable consume record enforcement.

steps: Implement durable consume record persistence and uniqueness checks in authoritative execution path.
Add ordering guarantees: durability commit precedes authoritative effect acceptance.
Add crash-replay and fault-injection tests covering duplicate consume denial after recovery.
Add metrics export for durable_consume_record_coverage and duplicate deny counters.
Run cargo fmt --all && cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings && cargo test --workspace.

criteria: Authoritative duplicate consume attempts for same ajc_id are always denied.
Durable consume record is committed before authoritative effect acceptance.
Crash-replay tests show no acceptance with missing durable consume record.

notes.security: In-memory uniqueness is non-admissible for authoritative mode and must be treated as fail-closed.
notes.verification: Include restart and partial-write fault injections to prove durability barrier correctness.
